XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse in Manuscript 1501-1558. London: Mansell, 1992; prepared and completed by Michael Rudick and Susan J. Ringler TM 345.
_description: No remedy: a lover’s complaint — four stanzas of 7 short lines, the first and last lines of each stanza: ‘Demyd wrongfully’

BLAdd5465.First Lines:
Demyd wrongfullyIn absent& wote not
                    why…
BLAdd5465.Note:
With musical setting, incomplete, only one voice of the two, because the
                    facing page is lost.
BLAdd5465.Editions:
Fehr,  Bernhard. 
             “Die Lieder des Fairfax MS (Add. 5465 Brit. Mus.).” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         106 (1901): 48-70: 53.
Stevens,  John,
                        ed.  
             Music and Poetry in the Early Tudor Court.
         London: Methuen, 1961: 353.
